phrases.text: Từ là từ phu tướng bảo kiếm sắc phong lên đàng a
phrases.english: From the time the general left with his sword on the journey

phrases.text: Vào ra ngóng trông tin ở chàng
phrases.english: Coming in and out, waiting for news from him
At the fifth watch of night, dreaming hazily
I keep waiting for news from you

phrases.text: Ôi gan vàng quặn đau i a
phrases.english: Oh, my heart aches so painfully

phrases.text: Đường dù xa ong bướm xin đõ đừng phụ nghĩa tào khang
phrases.english: Though the road is far, please don't betray our vows
Still waiting for news from my beloved

phrases.text: Vọng Phu vọng phu vọng luống trông tin chàng
phrases.english: Longing for husband, longing, always waiting for news from you

phrases.text: Chàng hỡi chàng có hay đêm thiếp nằm luống những sầu tây
phrases.english: My darling, do you know that at night I lie filled with endless sorrow

phrases.text: Biết bao thuở đó đây xum vầy
phrases.english: How many times we gathered together here and there

phrases.text: duyên sắc cầm đừng lợt phai í i
phrases.english: May our bond not fade away

phrases.text: Thiếp nguyện cho chàng nguyện cho chàng hai chữ bình an
phrases.english: I pray for you, pray for you to be safe and sound
Hoping you'll return to our path together
